com.pkry.db

Class DbModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkry.db.DbModule

  • @Named
 @ApplicationScoped
public class DbModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Class DbModule is responsible for communicating with the data base and obtaining some informations from it.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        @PostConstruct
public void init()

      • checkLogin

        public int checkLogin(java.lang.String login)
        Checks if the login exists in data base.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule
        Returns:
        the number of signs of the password assigned to that login.

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String login,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             java.lang.String passwordIndexes)
        Checks if the password received from ManagementModule is correct
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule
        password - user's password received from ManagementModule
        passwordIndexes - user's password received from ManagementModule
        Returns:
        returns True flag if the password matches the one in data base.

      • checkAD

        public java.lang.String checkAD(java.lang.String login,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String passwordIndexes,
                                java.lang.String ad,
                                java.lang.String adIndexes)
        Checks if the additional information (AD) obtained from ManagementModule is correct.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule
        password - user's password received from ManagementModule
        passwordIndexes - user's password indexes received from ManagementModule
        ad - AD inserted by user received from ManagementModule
        adIndexes - AD indexes received from ManagementModule
        Returns:
        if AD is correct returns sessionID otherwise feedback with information about error.

      • getAccount

        public AccountDTO getAccount(java.lang.String sessionId,
                             java.lang.String login)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets informaton about the account of the user who requested to obtain such information
        Parameters:
        sessionId - ID of current session received from ManagementModule.
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule.
        Returns:
        returns AccountDTO object with information about the account.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the session expired throws SESSION EXPIRED exception.

      • checkMoney

        public java.lang.String checkMoney(java.lang.String login,
                                   java.lang.String sessionId,
                                   double money)
        Checks if the account has enough money to make a money transfer.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule
        sessionId - ID of current session received from ManagementModule.
        money - amount of money user wants so send someone.
        Returns:
        infomation whether or not the user has enough money; if the session expired sends BAD SESSION message.

      • doTransfer

        public java.lang.String doTransfer(java.lang.String login,
                                   double money,
                                   java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Makes a money transfer to destination account. Checks if the destination number is correct.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule
        money - amount of money user wants so send someone.
        accountNumber - destination number account
        Returns:
        if the transfer is done sends TRANSFER DONE message otherwise information about error.

      • logout

        public boolean logout(java.lang.String login,
                      java.lang.String sessionId)
        Functions update data base with information that user logged out - sets session to false.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule.
        sessionId - ID of current session received from ManagementModule.
        Returns:
        true if logout was correct.

      • getHistory

        public java.util.List<Transfer> getHistory(java.lang.String login,
                                           java.lang.String sessionId)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Function obtains a list of Transfer type with transactions performed on user's account.
        Parameters:
        login - user's login received from ManagementModule.
        sessionId - ID of current session received from ManagementModule.
        Returns:
        list of transactions
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the session expired throws SESSION EXPIRED exception.
